Package org.optim4j.ns

Interface Optimizer<A extends Agent>

  • Type Parameters:
    A - A solution agent.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdaptiveLargeNeighborhoodSearchOptimizer, NeighborhoodSearchOptimizer
    public interface Optimizer<A extends Agent>
    Optimizer based on neighborhood search.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      A optimize​(A agent)
      Executes the optimization process.

    • Method Detail

      • optimize

        A optimize​(A agent)
        Executes the optimization process. Accepts a solution agent as input optimizes the same using destroy and repair process through multiple iterations following neighborhood search methodology and returns an optimum result.
        Parameters:
        agent - a valid solution agent
        Returns:
        an optimized solution agent
